item.title: Review NAKIVO Backup & Replication v7.5 - Replication
item.description: In this part of the NAKIVO Backup & Replication review I highlight the replication feature. With the replication feature you can replicate VMs. The source VMs are copied, a VM replica is created of each and replicated to the target VMware environment (also known as the recovery site). VM Replication protects for example against the following type of disasters:
